name: web-to-figma-plugin
description: Final Figma plugin for web-to-Figma conversion

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc --project plugin-tsconfig.json && npm run build:assets
scripts.build:assets: cp src/ui.html dist/ui.html 2>/dev/null || echo 'No ui.html found'
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
